notes: FIX: The admin setting for lap time deletion is now correctly checked on initial load of the Winner's Circle.
ENHANCEMENT: The lap times for the first available event are now loaded automatically.
FEATURE: Admins can now delete any lap time when deletion is enabled, regardless of ownership.
FEATURE: Added a 'Manage Lap Times' link in Developer Mode for easier administration.
FIX: Resolved a critical SyntaxError on load by correctly exporting the 'initLapTimes' function from its module.
FEATURE: Added a new admin setting in Developer Mode to enable or disable the deletion of lap times.
SECURITY: The backend now checks if lap time deletion is enabled before processing a delete request.
FIX: Resolved a 500 Internal Server Error when fetching all events for the Winner's Circle.
ENHANCEMENT: Moved event sorting from the database query to the Python backend to avoid the need for a composite index in Firestore.
